name: csa-voc-rnaseq-anaylsis
description: ## Project Overview This repository contains an in-depth analysis of RNA-seq data comparing the effects of **Cyclosporin A (CsA)** and **Voclosporin (VOC)** treatments against control groups. The study utilizes iPathwayGuide to highlight differentially expressed genes (DEGs), pathway impacts, and biological processes affected by these treatments.
